commands.cmd_bank: Lists all available commands with their descriptions.

commands.generate_cog: Generates a new cog file based on user input via DMs (admin).

bot_commands.add_function: Adds a new cog via DM (admin).
bot_commands.enable_function: Enables a cog for the server (admin).
bot_commands.disable_function: Disables a cog for the server (admin).
bot_commands.logs: Displays the odin.service logs up to the maximum allowable length (admin).
bot_commands.install_deps: Installs dependencies from requirements.txt within the venv and restarts (admin).
bot_commands.generate_cog: Generates a new cog file based on user input via DMs (admin).
bot_commands.execute: Executes a shell command on the server (admin, restricted).
bot_commands.sync_functions: Rebuilds functions.json to match loaded cogs (admin).
